name: Sailesh Agrawal
position: Assistant Manager @EXL Services | Data Scientist | IIT Kharagpur
about: I am a fourth-year undergraduate student of the Department of Chemical Engineering specializing in Petroleum  Engineering.

current_company.name: EXL
current_company.title: Assistant Manager @EXL Services | Data Scientist | IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Project Intern
experience.description: • Used Box Behnken Design and Central Composite Design to simulate 2 models with an accuracy of 98.7% that analyzes the viscosity of polymer solution with the help of Minitab software. • The developed models can also help in providing on-the-fly recommendations for the APAM (polymer) concentration in a given produced-water/slickwater system; thus providing the real-time solution.• The model can be used for friction loss reduction in pipes during hydraulic fracturing (Enhanced oil recovery).
experience.description_html: • Used Box Behnken Design and Central Composite Design to simulate 2 models with an accuracy of 98.7% that analyzes the viscosity of polymer solution with the help of Minitab software. • The developed models can also help in providing on-the-fly recommendations for the APAM (polymer) concentration in a given produced-water/slickwater system; thus providing the real-time solution.• The model can be used for friction loss reduction in pipes during hydraulic fracturing (Enhanced oil recovery).
